title: Hotels
subtitle: Prestigious projects
gallerydescription: ESS has successfully completed various prestigious projects throughout the years. Below you can find a selection of interesting reference projects sorted by industry. Take a close look behind the scenes to discover the possibilities ESS has to offer.

articles.title: W HOTEL
articles.subtitle: LUXURY
articles.description: Tel Aviv is a city on the central coast of Israel. Reacently the residences at W Tel Aviv - Jaffa opened his doors in this City. The building, which historically housed a French hospital, contains a luxury hotel as well as a set of branded residences.
